{{Infobox Italian comune | name = Capri Leone | official_name = Comune di Capri Leone | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 38 |latm = 5 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 14 |longm = 44 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(4,240)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Sicily]] | province = [[Province of Messina]] (ME) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 6.6 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 4240 | population_as_of = Dec. 2004 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Caprileonesi o capritani | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 400 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 98070 | area_code = 0941 | website = | footnotes = }} '''Capri Leone''' ([[Sicilian language|Sicilian]]: '''''Capri Liuni''''') is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Messina]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Sicily]], located about 120 km east of [[Palermo]] and about 70 km west of [[Messina]]. As of 31 December 2004, it had a population of 4,240 and an area of 6.6 km².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].
It is commonly referred to as ''Rocca di Capri Leone'' or simply ''Rocca''. Capri Leone borders the following municipalities: [[Capo d'Orlando]], [[Frazzanò]], [[Mirto, Italy|Mirto]], [[San Marco d'Alunzio]], [[Torrenova]]. == Demographic evolution == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8) id:sfondo value:rgb(1,1,1) id:barra value:rgb(0.6,0.7,0.8) ImageSize = width:455 height:303 PlotArea = left:50 bottom:50 top:30 right:30 DateFormat = x.y
